Relo.name: CASIO
Relo.description: Casio watches are known for their durability, reliability, and functionality. They are often used in outdoor and sports activities, as well as in industrial and military settings.

Relo.name: ROLEX
Relo.description: Rolex watches are known for precision, waterproofness, autonomy, robustness, simplicity, craftsmanship, comfort and durability.

Relo.name: ZENITH
Relo.description: ZENITH combines the beauty of contemporary design with the savoir faire and tradition of Swiss watchmaking.

Relo.name: TIMEX
Relo.description: Timex watches are known for their reliability, affordability, and timeless design.

Relo.name: SEIKO
Relo.description: Seiko watches are known for precision and accuracy, innovation and refinement.

Relo.name: ORIENT
Relo.description: One of the hallmarks of the Orient Watch brand is its dedication to the development of the mechanical movement.

Relo.name: OMEGA
Relo.description: Each collection is designed to suit any style, from the prestigious and elegant De Ville watches, to the timeless Constellation collection, embodying Swiss watchmaking heritage and unparalleled precision.

Relo.name: MORIS
Relo.description: The Morris York watches have a stainless steel structure and crystal glass the watches are covered with sapphire, thus making them watches resistant to shocks and scratches.

Relo.name: CITIZEN
Relo.description: The first to create quartz crystal and titanium timepieces

Relo.name: IWC
Relo.description: IWC are pioneers in high-quality pilot and aviation watches, and for their expertise in their use of titanium. Slick, contemporary, and quality aviation watches renowned for their reliability.
